Stalybridge

The Buffet Bar, eighth stop on the Real Ale Trail

Find the pub

Located towards the middle of platform 4. Probably accessible from the platform, otherwise turn immediately left after leaving the station and walk back along the side of the station building to find the bar.

About the pub

A Victorian station buffet bar dating from 1885 and extended into the 1st class ladies waiting room.

Have a look at the The Buffet Bar website.

See what's been happening at the The Buffet Bar on Facebook.

Pssst... Tell us about Moz

Alasdair and Martin (the best men) want to hear from you. Let them know what a great bloke Moz is, or dish some dirt. Either way they'd love to share your stories with the wedding party on the big day *
